amendment.description: To require an evaluation of the effectiveness of the National Counterterrorism Center.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3912 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3912 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Snowe. (consideration: CR S10248-10250; text: CR S10249) To require an evaluation of the effectiveness of the National Counterterrorism Center.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3912 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3912 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Snowe.
